description:
List all packages within a set of registries. These packages do not include the contents of the files. To get more details about a package use the view package
 call.

project_root.description: The absolute path to the root of the user's project. Should always be specified to provide appropriate context.

registries.description: The URLs or local file paths to registries e.g. ./.skiff/registry.json.

title: List Packages Request
